title: Bananas in pyjamas: the big parade
creator_credit: Di Drew, Tammy Burnstock and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: B1 and B2 are always on the lookout for fun while the Teddies and Rat in a Hat are always ready to join in. Life is full of surprises in Cuddles Avenue. There are ten stories in this compilation which include: Pink spots; Rat’s hat; Big parade; Pony ride; Magic lamp; Salon rat; Play time; Treasure hunt, Fire fire and Circus time. In the title episode, B1, B2 and all their friends make their very own circus parade.
